     DESCRIPTION:

Deep beneath the ruins of post-apocalyptic Moscow, in the crumbling Metro tunnels, the remnants of humanity struggle to survive. Hordes of mutants storm last refuge of survivors. But rather than unite, the Metro is divided into warring factions that fought each other for control of the underground. Under the ground started this civil war that could wipe humanity from the face of the earth.

     Features repack:

Based on Metro: Last Light - Limited Edition  Metro 2033: A Ray of Hope - Special Edition (Deeep Silver  Buka Entertainment) (RUS  ENG  MULTi9) [DL] [Steam-Rip] by RG Origins
Do not recoded / no cut
Includes DLC: Faction Pack, RPK, Ranger Mode
The possibility of you not to download unnecessary voiceovers: english.catalyst - English voice, russian.catalyst - Russian voice
Installation time ~ 10-15 minutes.
